Description / Steps to Reproduce:
1. Login to the application
2. Navigate to the dashboard
3. Wait for the dashboard to load
Expected Result: Dashboard should load within 3 seconds with all metrics displayed correctly
Actual Result: Dashboard takes over 10 seconds to load and some charts fail to render properly

Description / Steps to Reproduce:
1. Go to Reports section
2. Select date range for the report
3. Click on Export button
Expected Result: Report should download as CSV with all selected data
Actual Result: Export button does not respond when clicked, no download occurs

Description / Steps to Reproduce:
1. Navigate to User Profile
2. Click on profile picture
3. Select an image file (JPG/PNG)
4. Click Upload
Expected Result: Image should upload successfully and display as profile picture
Actual Result: After uploading, the image appears distorted and pixelated

Description / Steps to Reproduce:
1. Click on Forgot Password
2. Enter registered email address
3. Submit the form
Expected Result: Password reset email should be received within 2 minutes
Actual Result: Email is received but the reset link has already expired by the time user clicks it

Description / Steps to Reproduce:
1. Go to Settings
2. Navigate to Notifications tab
3. Toggle email notifications OFF
4. Save settings
Expected Result: Email notifications should be disabled for the user
Actual Result: Despite toggling OFF, user continues to receive email notifications

Description / Steps to Reproduce:
1. Go to main search page
2. Enter search query
3. Apply filters (category, date range)
4. Click Search
Expected Result: Results should be filtered according to selected filters
Actual Result: Filters are ignored and all results matching the search query are displayed
Remarks / Notes: Filter parameters not being sent to API

Description / Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open application on mobile device
2. Navigate to the Transactions page
3. Scroll horizontally if needed
Expected Result: Page should be fully responsive and content should fit within screen width without horizontal scroll
Actual Result: Content overflows horizontally, requiring user to scroll left-right to view full information

Description / Steps to Reproduce:
1. Trigger action that calls external API
2. Wait for response
Expected Result: API should respond within 5 seconds or show appropriate timeout message
Actual Result: Application freezes for over 30 seconds before showing generic error message
Remarks / Notes: Need to implement timeout handling and retry logic
